description: An innate knowledge gained by those who harness the power of a bio-organic exoskeleton. Although not as complex as others, it greatly increases overall proficiency over bio-organic weapons.
initiate: Your suit trembles as you take a defensive stance.

static_buffs.name: Biomorph's Stance
static_buffs.description:
You always take on a defensive stance, and with the help of your suit, blocking greatly reduces damage taken.

+1 Block attempts, blocked damage decreased by 66% of Strength.
